public class ImageAdapter extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
Class that Handles our Gridview and Displaying all the images in the Gridview Source: Youtube URL:

      Constructor for the Adapter
      Parameters:
      context - - Context
      fragmentManager -
      image_paths - :ArrayList- Contains the image paths from where we dowload the images off of the firestorage ie the URL associated with the images
      image_delete_paths - :ArrayList- Stores the Filename of the photographs so we can delete associated images From the firestore

    • getView

      public android.view.View getView(int position, android.view.View convertView, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Method Required for adapter- this method loads the images into the gridview using the Glide library The method plaes the very first position as the add button which gives the option of adding a photo from gallary or camera when clicked, all other images are clickable which bring up an enlarged photo fragment
      Parameters:
      position - :int- describes position in gridveiew
      convertView - :View
      parent - :Viewgroup
